titleText: Microsoft C.E.O. Says Tech’s Progress on Gender Equality Is ‘Not Sufficient’

mainText: A group of major companies led by the technology industry announced plans Tuesday to commit more than $300 million over five years to boost computer science programs among younger students. Amazon.com, Facebook, Alphabet, Microsoft, and Salesforce.com.

titleText: Microsoft tries to stem its self-made collaboration-tool confusion
